name: BosveldStereoLiveStream
0:
”Alexa, open b. o. s. v. e. l. d. stereo”
”Alexa, play b. o. s. v. e. l. d. stereo”
”Alexa, b. o. s. v. e. l. d. stereo”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. o. s. v. e. l. d. stereo
des:
Live stream of Bosveld Stereo from Hartbeespoort in South Africa. Visit Bosveld Stereo at: http://bosveldstereo.co.za/.

To launch this skill, create a routine in the Alexa app and add your preferred phrase to launch this station. Alexa does not support the word Bosveld in a skill but you can create your own routine using the word Bosveld. Try it out!

Terms of use:
The Bosveld Stereo DJs broadcast in the Afrikaans language.
This skill or parts of it may be discontinued at any time and is provided without any guarantees.
The skill might contain errors and might stop to function for reasons outside of the control of the developer. You use this skill at your own risk. 
The developer is not affiliated with the radio station in any way and created this skill purely for the enjoyment of listening to the station. This skill is therefore an unofficial streaming channel for fans of the station.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
